entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:52 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 08:52 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
